languages.text: "Тебе о чем-нибудь говорят слова "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"? Это должно быть связано с Теодорой".
"Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."
languages.original_text: "Тебе о чем-нибудь говорят слова "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"? Это должно быть связано с Теодорой".

traits.locale_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."
"Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."
"Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."
"Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

languages.text: «¿Las palabras "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" y "tecnoplaga" significan algo para usted? Están relacionadas con Theodora de algún modo».
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: «¿Las palabras "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" y "tecnoplaga" significan algo para usted? Están relacionadas con Theodora de algún modo».

languages.text: 「“エピタフ”、“N872-04事件”、または“テック・ブライト”という言葉に聞き覚えはないか？ シオドーラとなんらかの関係があるらしいのだが…」
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: 「“エピタフ”、“N872-04事件”、または“テック・ブライト”という言葉に聞き覚えはないか？ シオドーラとなんらかの関係があるらしいのだが…」

languages.text: “你对‘荒垄碑碣’、‘N872-04号事故’或者‘技术枯萎病’这些词有印象吗？它们和西奥多拉有关。”
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: “你对‘荒垄碑碣’、‘N872-04号事故’或者‘技术枯萎病’这些词有印象吗？它们和西奥多拉有关。”

languages.text: « Les mots "Épitaphe", "Incident N872-04" ou "technopeste" signifient-ils quelque chose pour vous ? Il semble qu'ils soient liés à Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: « Les mots "Épitaphe", "Incident N872-04" ou "technopeste" signifient-ils quelque chose pour vous ? Il semble qu'ils soient liés à Théodora. »

languages.text: "Sagen Euch die Wörter 'Epitaph', 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche' irgendetwas? Sie sind irgendwie mit Theodora verbunden."
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: "Sagen Euch die Wörter 'Epitaph', 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche' irgendetwas? Sie sind irgendwie mit Theodora verbunden."

languages.text: "'Sinyazıt', 'N872-04 Sayılı Hadise' veya 'tekno afeti' sözleri sana bir şey ifade ediyor mu? Theodora ile çözemediğim bir bağlantıları var."
languages.original_text: "Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' mean anything to you? They are connected to Theodora somehow."

traits.locale_text: "'Kitabe', 'N872-04 Hadisesi' veya 'tekno afeti' sözleri sana bir şey ifade ediyor mu? Theodora ile çözemediğim bir bağlantıları var."
